Class SimulationMode

java.lang.Object
VideoPoker.SimulationMode
public class SimulationMode extends Object
Simulation mode is where the game is automatically played with a perfect strategy in order to understand the average gain in the playerâ€™s credit.
Author:

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulationMode

      public SimulationMode(String credit, String bet, String numDeals) throws PlayingCardException
      Constructor that initializes the variables and start a game with the perfect strategy
      Parameters:
      credit - initial credit of the player
      bet - amount of credits the player will bet in every play
      numDeals - total number of deals in one game
      Throws:
      PlayingCardException - if the bet value is valid

  • Method Details

    • playPerfect

      public void playPerfect(int numDeals) throws PlayingCardException
      Play the game with a perfect strategy numDeals times
      Parameters:
      numDeals - times the game will me simulated, as in number of plays of the game
      Throws:
      PlayingCardException - preventing from an exception in file reader and scan
